languages.text: "Не с ссорой, но с ратным делом, суровым".
"Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."
languages.original_text: "Не с ссорой, но с ратным делом, суровым".

traits.locale_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «No vengo a buscar pelea. Vengo por un asunto serio. El asunto de la batalla».
languages.original_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."

traits.locale_text: «No vengo a buscar pelea. Vengo por un asunto serio. El asunto de la batalla».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “不是来吵架的。我有很严肃的事情，关于战斗的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."

traits.locale_text: “不是来吵架的。我有很严肃的事情，关于战斗的事情。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「いや、喧嘩などしない。死について話しに来た。戦いの話しだよ」
languages.original_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、喧嘩などしない。死について話しに来た。戦いの話しだよ」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Détrompez-vous. Si je suis venu, c'est pour évoquer avec vous une affaire importante... La guerre. »
languages.original_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."

traits.locale_text: « Détrompez-vous. Si je suis venu, c'est pour évoquer avec vous une affaire importante... La guerre. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Ich möchte nicht streiten. Ich komme in ernster Angelegenheit. Es geht um den Kampf."
languages.original_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte nicht streiten. Ich komme in ernster Angelegenheit. Es geht um den Kampf."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Dövüşmeye gelmedim. Önemli bir iş için geldim: Savaş işi."
languages.original_text: "Not to quarrel. I come on grave business. The business of battle."

traits.locale_text: "Dövüşmeye gelmedim. Önemli bir iş için geldim: Savaş işi."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
